tweets.text: Important advice from colleagues in @EnvAgency who are on scene with us in the area. @HumbersideFire have deployed a drone with night vision & recording capability to help monitor the situation. @BBCPaulMurphy Stay safe everyone https://t.co/xDQJMV7O1K

Flood warnings are now in place for River Aire, Don and Dutch River at East Cowick, West Cowick and Lidgate. Check if you‚Äôre at risk and what to do to prepare for a flood. https://t.co/xbA8xs7Upr https://t.co/gLW7M7vZ2C

Colleagues from @HumbersideFire @Humberbeat @EnvAgency @East_Riding etc working to respond to this. Command arrangements through Humber Local Resilience Forum stood up. tweets.text: Efforts being made tonight to stop floodwater reaching at least two low-lying communities in East Yorkshire. This follows a breach in the bank of the Aire & Calder Navigation near East Cowick. This area was extensively flooded earlier in the year. https://t.co/ppcZNJ8KzT

tweets.text:
@dikesmarshfarm @tom_bayston @EnvAgencyYNE @NFUnortheast @CanalRiverTrust Apparently the bottom of the canal has burst where it goes over a culvert? Don‚Äôt know yet if this is correct. 
I‚Äôve heard of this happening in the past and using round bales to try and stem the flow. Throwing them in and letting the suction draw them into the hole.
@tom_bayston @EnvAgencyYNE @NFUnortheast It's hard to believe that the canal has burst! But I don't know how much work @CanalRiverTrust put into protecting its assetsü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
@MarkBowersEA @ShropCouncil @EnvAgencyMids Already ground water level rising fast from river and field water at Emstrey below Shrewsbury, drains leaking out already, 2 feet odd to go.
@dikesmarshfarm @EnvAgencyYNE @NFUnortheast Highways depot - West Cowick. Flowing back from canal.
@tom_bayston @EnvAgencyYNE @NFUnortheast Where is that Tom?

@tom_bayston @EnvAgencyYNE @NFUnortheast We haven't had that much rain Tom?ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

Here we go again - pumps are on and working to capacity however the funnel is filling up and there is nowhere for the water üí¶ to go‚Å¶@EnvAgencyYNE‚Å© #flooding ‚Å¶@NFUnortheast‚Å© https://t.co/iNOVZrrqXB
